name: Total War: ATTILA - Celts Culture Pack
name_original: Total War: ATTILA - Celts Culture Pack
description:
Total War: ATTILA - Celts Culture Pack is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Total War: ATTILA - Celts Culture Pack is available on PC.
